sections: subscribers will talk with progressive movement leader Nina Turner, who is running in Ohio's 11th congressional district special election this year.

Turner was a Cleveland City Councilor from 2006 to 2008 and an Ohio State Senator from 2008 until 2014. She then became president of the progressive political action organization Our Revolution, and served as a national co-chair of Bernie Sanders' 2020 campaign. In December, she announced her candidacy in the  Ohio's 11th congressional district special election, which will take place on Nov. 2, 2021.
These live chat events are exclusively for
paid subscribers, who are able to watch the broadcasts live and ask questions in real time. They can also watch a replay of the chat following the event.
Event login information for our paid subscribers is listed below.
Please register for the event ahead of time by using the link and password below in the login information section. And please start posting your questions in the chat room now!
DETAILS AND LOGIN INFO FOR 5/6 EVENT:
The live chat with Nina Turner will take place on Thursday 5/6 at 7:00pm ET (4:00pm PST).
To participate, subscribers should go to this link:
(Note: If subscribers miss the event, they can always view a replay at the link above by using the same password.)
• Go to the event link and register for the event right now so that you don’t have to deal with login/registration issues at the time of the event.
• Copy and paste the event URL into your browser and copy and paste the event password in. The event URL is: https://www.crowdcast.io/e/ninaturner
• If possible, please try to use a regular desktop or laptop computer, and use the Chrome browser. You can read more about browser compatibility
• If you want to participate using an iPhone or iPad, you can download Crowdcast’s app

• If you are connected to the live broadcast and have connectivity issues, you should refresh your browser; hit "Help" at the top of the screen (which enters you into compatibility mode); and click the settings cog icon on the bottom right corner and switch to 360p resolution.
